an3.125:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati gotamake cetiye.
an3.125:2.2: Sanidanaham, bhikkhave, dhammam desemi, no anidanam.
an3.125:2.3: Sappatihariyaham, bhikkhave, dhammam desemi, no appatihariyam.
an3.125:2.4: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, abhinnaya dhammam desayato no anabhinnaya, sanidanam dhammam desayato no anidanam, sappatihariyam dhammam desayato no appatihariyam, karaniyo ovado, karaniya anusasani.
an3.125:2.5: Alanca pana vo, bhikkhave, tutthiya, alam attamanataya, alam somanassaya:
an3.125:3.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
an3.125:3.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane sahassi lokadhatu akampitthati.
